protocol.text: Seeds of A. thaliana, col 0 were stratified at 3-4C for 2-4 days and then grown under 22-23C, 16h photoperiod and 175-210 micromol per sec light intensity
14 days old plants were sprayed with surfactant and herbicide solutions in a RIC spray chamber (RC-5000-100EP)
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 4 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Intensities of the fluorescence emission were captured and array image was visually screened for signal artifacts
Triazol extraction of total RNA and subsequent purification with Rneasy mini spin columns
